thread.title: Australian casino boss Packer quits Crown Resorts board

title: Australian casino boss Packer quits Crown Resorts board
text:
Australian casino boss Packer quits Crown Resorts board 7:38pm IST - 01:26 
Australian billionaire James Packer has quit the board of casino operator Crown Resorts citing mental illness, following a break-up with Mariah Carey and the failure of Crown's global expansion. Ryan Brooks reports.   
Australian billionaire James Packer has quit the board of casino operator Crown Resorts citing mental illness, following a break-up with Mariah Carey and the failure of Crown's global expansion. Ryan Brooks reports.  //reut.rs/2putWap
